jobs_results.title: Front End Mobile & Web Developer ‚Äì React & IOS Or Android (English)
jobs_results.description:
Front End Mobile & Web Developer - React & iOS or Android (English)

Basel, Switzerland

CHF 120,000 ‚Äì CHF 130,000

Encouraged to design and develop your applications creatively.

Are you a front end developer looking for more ownership over your work, and the freedom to design and develop more creatively? We are working with a private bank in Basel looking for a Front End Developer to join the mobile and web application team.

We are happy to consider EU citizens who are not currently living in Switzerland if you are interested in relocating.

Your challenge
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll design and develop the bank‚Äôs client-facing mobile and web applications using ReactJS/Native, along with some iOS and Android development.
‚Ä¢ Analyse new features for the client-facing mobile and web applications.
‚Ä¢ Support front end integration with back end services.
‚Ä¢ Extend the CI/CD build pipelines.

About you

A front end developer with circa 5 years‚Äô experience in mobile and web application development.

Experience with React and iOS or Android.

What next

For an informal chat, please call me on +44 20 3763 9533. Don‚Äôt worry if your CV isn‚Äôt up to date. Just send me what you have and we can deal with that later.
#J-18808-Ljbffr

jobs_results.title: iOS Core Engineer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Switzerland

As a iOS Core Engineer, you have the opportunity to work on our entire software stack and expand your knowledge about state-of-the art software engineering. ‚ÄúCore‚Äù means that you will be focused on our SDK and the critical services of our products. When you design software, you will have to think about ease of use for third parties, reliability, caching, distributed persistence and resilience in order to build high quality systems. As part of an international startup with 130 employees, you will be contributing to our ongoing growth across many markets.

What does the Tracking squad do?
‚Ä¢ Collect and ingest various mobile sensor data.
‚Ä¢ Design, implement and support the tracking services in our mobile SDK.
‚Ä¢ Solve a wide range of engineering challenges in order to make the critical services of our product more reliable, maintainable and efficient.

Role Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Develop parts of our core tracking technology: the FAIRTIQ SDK. It is integrated into our own apps but also into dozens of partnered apps.
‚Ä¢ Design, implement, maintain and improve mobile services used actively by 1M+ users and contributing to millions of public transport journeys.
‚Ä¢ Write maintainable, clean, simple, testable, scalable and efficient code.
‚Ä¢ Work with modern native iOS technologies like Core Location, Motion & Fitness, SwiftUI, Swift Package Manager and many more...
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with mobile engineers from other squads and bring mobile engineering to the next level.
‚Ä¢ Monitor released apps and SDK.
‚Ä¢ Work with developers and product experts to expand our solution worldwide.

Who are we looking for?
‚Ä¢ BSc or MSc in computer science or a related field
‚Ä¢ At least 2 years work experience in mobile engineering
‚Ä¢ Experience working with Swift and SDKs
‚Ä¢ Broad interest in mobile technologies and tools (Android, CI/CD for mobile, Kotlin Multiplatform, etc‚Ä¶)
‚Ä¢ Strong software design & architecture skills
‚Ä¢ Analytical thinking and good problem solving skills
‚Ä¢ Good team player in an agile team
‚Ä¢ Strong identification to the FAIRTIQ Values
‚Ä¢ Creative, self-confident, independent
‚Ä¢ Willing to learn and adapt to new technologies
‚Ä¢ Fluent English speaking, writing and verbal language skills
‚Ä¢ BSc or MSc in computer science or a related field
‚Ä¢ Based in Europe

We offer

At FAIRTIQ, we believe that our employees are our biggest asset. A healthy culture, based on respect, inclusion, diversity and individual empowerment is the key to our success story.
‚Ä¢ Dynamic and international work environment
‚Ä¢ Chance to be part of a fast growing, international startup
‚Ä¢ Budget and support for self-improvement
‚Ä¢ Creativity and innovation boosters with our ‚ÄúTech Joker Days‚Äù (work on whatever you think may help FAIRTIQ)
‚Ä¢ Guilds: self-organized groups of engineers, with a common interest in a technical or business domain
‚Ä¢ Lots of leadership opportunities (tech, people)
‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours & fully remote work;

Recruitment Process
‚Ä¢ Screening interview with Pedro (from the People Team): ~45 minutes
‚Ä¢ Tech Screening & Coding interview: 90 minutes
‚Ä¢ System & Software Design interview: 90 minutes

Please apply in English exclusively.

Find out more about our benefits, teams, company culture and tech stack on our FAQ page here!

At FAIRTIQ, we don‚Äôt just accept difference, we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive from it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. FAIRTIQ is a proud equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability or gender identity.

Data Protection - Your personal data will be held by Fairtiq for a maximum of 12 months. Under the GDPR, you have the right to request access to your personal data, to request that your personal data be rectified or erased, and to request that processing of your personal data be restricted. Please contact dataprotection@fairtiq.com if you wish for your data to be removed.

This offer from "FAIRTIQ" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 75% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Full-Stack Mobile Developer / Mobile Software Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Aesyra is a MedTech start-up company that aims to innovate sleep care. The company is headquartered at EPFL Innovation Park in Lausanne and has production and offices in Bussigny (VD), Switzerland. Aesyra has developed a first series of innovative products dedicated to common sleep and oral disorders.

We are looking for a Full-Stack Mobile Developer or Mobile Software Engineer to join our young, hard-working and fast-growing team, motivated in bringing the company to the next level.

Job Description

Your tasks

¬∑ Design, develop, document, test and maintain mobile apps for iOS and Android systems

¬∑ Support the management in decision-making concerning software development matters

¬∑ Support the regulatory team in generating the required documentation and ensuring product compliance

Qualifications

Your profile

¬∑ Bachelor or Master in Computer Engineering or Computer Science.

¬∑ From 2 to 5 years experience as a mobile developer in industry

¬∑ Experience in the development of native apps on both iOS and Android platforms

Ready to join a hard-working team and passionate about taking a young company to the next level

Additional Information

Software development general knowledge

¬∑ Data structures and algorithms

¬∑ Software architecture design

¬∑ UI design principles

¬∑ Version control

¬∑ Software documentation

Development skills

¬∑ XCode IDE

¬∑ Android Studio IDE

¬∑ Swift language

¬∑ Java language

¬∑ Kotlin a plus but not required

¬∑ SQL databases

Proficiency in the following is a plus:

¬∑ UML

¬∑ Linux systems, shell scripting

¬∑ Web application development (LAMP stack or similar)

¬∑ Medical device software development processes (IEC 62304)

Soft skills

¬∑ Excellent communication skills and ability to work well with and train others

¬∑ Collaborative mindset

¬∑ Fluency in English (spoken and written)

¬∑ Willingness to join a multicultural fast-growing start-up team

jobs_results.title: iOS Engineer for Mobile Banking
jobs_results.description:
Welcome to UBS, a leading global financial institution that is committed to delivering exceptional services to our clients. We are currently seeking a highly skilled and dynamic iOS Engineer to join our Mobile Banking team. As an iOS Engineer, you will play a critical role in developing and maintaining our mobile banking application for iOS devices. We are looking for a talented individual with a passion for technology and innovation, who can bring their expertise and ideas to enhance our mobile banking experience for our clients. If you have a strong background in iOS development and a deep understanding of mobile technologies, we would love to hear from you.

Design and develop high-quality, user-friendly iOS applications for our mobile banking platform.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and implement new features.
Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure the stability and performance of the application.
Keep up-to-date with the latest iOS development trends and technologies, and proactively suggest improvements to enhance the user experience.
Troubleshoot and resolve any technical issues that may arise.
Write clear and concise technical documentation for all developed features.
Work closely with the UX/UI team to ensure a seamless and visually appealing user experience.
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to improve code quality.
Continuously optimize and improve the application's performance.
Proactively identify and address potential security vulnerabilities.
Ensure compliance with coding standards, best practices, and company guidelines.
Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders to provide progress updates and resolve any project-related issues.

UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.

jobs_results.title: Senior IOS developer -Berlin
jobs_results.description:
This young company is disrupting the sport and fitness industry, making a real difference in the way people stay fit and take part in sport. They have had huge success since their inception, growing to a team of 100+ with plans for further expansion. They are currently looking for iOS Developers to work in a cutting-edge and innovative team in Berlin.

Currently searching for Middle and Senior level iOS developers, this role will offer the successful candidate an amazing platform to grow professionally and personally. Renowned for flat hierarchies and short decision-making processes, every member of this international team is given the opportunity to put forward new ideas and to make a difference to the company‚Äôs ongoing success. Working with cutting-edge technologies and processes, be a part of something amazing and join today!
RESPONSIBILITIES:

You will take responsibility for the design and development of the iOS app, taking care of development, architecture, and API integration. You will work closely with other developers and QA‚Äôs, collaborating, supporting, and also challenging other team members to achieve the best end result.
YOUR BACKGROUND:

Minimum of 2-3 years in mobile iOS development.

Experience of working on an app from planning through to release.

Experience with Objective-C or Swift.

Experience or good understanding of OOD/OOP, DDD, design patterns, automated tests, and continuous integration.

Experience with Maps/Location Services, mobile deep linking, push notifications, AB testing, and analytics.

Experience working in an Agile environment.

Good written and spoken English ‚Äì German NOT required.
WHAT YOU WILL GET:

Flexible hours.

Free lunches/dinners.

Great office location.

Relocation and visa support if applicable.

Language courses.

Creative company days.

And more‚Ä¶

jobs_results.title: Senior/Lead iOS developer -Berlin
jobs_results.description:
A market leading Tech Company is looking for a Senior/Lead iOS Developer to join its advanced tech team.

This company has gone from strength to strength since opening 7 years ago and is currently undergoing an expansion due to continued success.

They have created a booking and reservation platform which has taken the market by storm.

Despite only being founded 7 years ago, they already have over 300 employees in their international team.

Well known as being Tech Leading and an extremely cool place to work, this job has a lot to offer!

YOUR BACKGROUND:
